remarks: A lower bound for the norm of a continuous linear functional.  Theorem 3.5(ii) of [Beran] p. 99.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nmcfnex.1 $e |- T e. LinFn $.
nmcfnex.2 $e |- T e. ConFn $.
nmcfnlbi $p |- ( A e. ~H -> ( abs ` ( T ` A ) ) <_ ( ( normfn ` T ) x. ( normh ` A ) ) ) $.
